block.p: Dressing Up Metropolitan Museum of Art, Fifth Avenue at 82nd Street; (212) 535-7710.

''Curios and Treasures,'' an exhibition of more than 65 garments and fashion accessories, runs through Jan. 21. The display includes an embroidered doublet, which was worn under armor, from the 1620's; a 16th-century silk purse; a 1905 dress and cape embroidered with silk floss and gold metallic thread; and a yellow velvet dress from 1925.

Tuesday through Sunday, 9:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. (till 9 Friday and Saturday). Suggested admission $10; students and those 65 and older, $5.
Twist and Turn New Museum of Contemporary Art, 583 Broadway (Houston Street); (212) 219-1222.

The museum's Broadway window has a display of ''Slab,'' a rubber-coated aluminum mat that can be molded into small household objects like vases, letter holders or bowls, through Aug. 24. ''Slab'' was designed by Henk Stallinga, a Dutch designer, who will introduce his book, ''Stallinga,'' at a talk from 6 to 8 tonight. No charge.
Antiques Show Garden State Convention and Exhibition Center, 50 Atrium Drive, near Davidson Avenue (Exit 10 from Route 287), Somerset, N.J.; (212) 255-0020.

More than 200 dealers will participate in an antiques show and sale of furniture, jewelry, clocks, textiles, lamps, prints, silver objects and ceramics on Saturday and Sunday from 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. Seminars on collecting pottery will be offered at 1 and 3 p.m. each day. Admission is $6.
Crafts in Delaware Winterthur Museum Garden and Library, on Kennett Pike (Route 52), six miles northwest of Wilmington, Del.; (800) 448-3883.

Music boxes, vases, jewelry, photographs, silk scarves, leather purses and carved furniture will be featured on Sept. 2 from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. and Sept. 3 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. There will be activities for children, demonstrations by artisans and an opportunity to tour period rooms at the museum. The Delaware Symphony Orchestra will present a concert at 7:30 p.m. on Sept. 2. Tickets, in advance, $8; day of festival, $10; those 5 to 11, $2, all times.
